LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value: In order to get more technical infos look at Product File.

LocaleResource.Name: Currency.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The default currency that will be used to generate the feed.

LocaleResource.Name: ProductPictureSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The size (pixels) for the product image.

LocaleResource.Name: TaskEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want the feed to be automatically generated.

LocaleResource.Name: GenerateStaticFileEachMinutes.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify a task period in minutes (generation of a new feed file).

LocaleResource.Name: ConfigSaveNote
LocaleResource.Value: Settings successfully saved. Please restart the application if "Automatically generate feed" has been changed.

LocaleResource.Name: StaticFileUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: URL of the generated product file.

LocaleResource.Name: BuildDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify what information to use for the description of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: DescriptionToPlainText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want to remove all HTML from the product description for the export.

LocaleResource.Name: Brand.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This value is used if there's no manufacturer\brand for a product.

LocaleResource.Name: ExportEanAsIsbn.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if the field EAN contains the ISBN (International Standard Book Number) of a product.

LocaleResource.Name: SpecialPrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want to export special price and special price period.

LocaleResource.Name: BranchOffice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if the following address is of a branch office where customers can pick-up goods.

LocaleResource.Name: ExportHotlineCost.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want to export the costs of your hotline.

LocaleResource.Name: HotlineCostPerMinute.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The phone costs of your hotline.

LocaleResource.Name: CategoryMapping.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The elmar product category that fits most to your products.

LocaleResource.Name: ElmarCategories
LocaleResource.Value: Animals;Books;Car & motorbike;Clothing;DVD/Video;Electronics;Erotic;Food & drink;Garden & agriculture;Hardware;Health;Household;Hygiene & Cosmetics;Jewelry;Music;Office products;Other;Photography & optics;Software;Sports;Telecommunications;Toys;Travel;Working at home;

LocaleResource.Name: UpdateInfo
LocaleResource.Value: Time settings when Elmar should update your export data.

LocaleResource.Name: UpdateHourFrom.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Lower period limit when the update should take place. Without a period the updating can start at any time.

LocaleResource.Name: UpdateHourTo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Upper period limit when the update should take place. Without a period the updating can start at any time.
